articles.content: Proudly flaunting the national flag on the top of the EBC, JD Majethia completed the climb in 11 days. He has been winning accolades from several actors from the industry and also his fans and follow… [+99 chars]

articles.title: Box Office: Custody Crashes In 1st Weekend - Mirchi9
articles.description: Box Office: Custody Crashes In 1st Weekend-At this rate, Custody is on course to emerge as another costly failure. The film has failed
articles.content:
Naga Chaitanya pinned a lot of his hopes on Custody as he trusted in proven Tamil filmmaker Venkat Prabhu. He aggressively promoted the film as well.
But as it turned out, Custody crashed very badly… [+1008 chars]

articles.author: HT Entertainment Desk
articles.title: Priyanka, Malti giggle as they cross road together in Nick's sweet post for wife - Hindustan Times
articles.description: On Mother's Day, Nick Jonas shared a new picture of Priyanka Chopra and Malti and a fun video of them crossing the road and laughing. | Bollywood
articles.content: Priyanka Chopra celebrated her second Mother's Day with daughter Malti Marie Chopra Jonas on Sunday. Her husband-singer Nick Jonas dedicated a sweet post to her on Instagram along with a fun video of… [+2100 chars]
